mapper.select: select a.ServComno, a.BedNum, a.OutPatient, a.Average, a.HospitalDeps, a.Feature, a.WorkingTime FROM Hmp_Hosp_Character a WHERE a.ServComNo = #{servcomno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Hmp_Hosp_Character (ServComno, BedNum, OutPatient, Average, HospitalDeps, Feature, WorkingTime, Operator, MakeDate, MakeTime) VALUES (#{servcomno}, #{bednum}, #{outpatient}, #{average}, #{hospitaldeps}, #{feature}, #{workingtime}, #{operator}, #{makedate}, #{maketime});
mapper.update: UPDATE Hmp_Hosp_Character SET BedNum = #{bednum}, OutPatient = #{outpatient}, Average = #{average}, HospitalDeps = #{hospitaldeps}, Feature = #{feature}, WorkingTime = #{workingtime} WHERE servcomno = #{servcomno}
